title: Gitlab Group
description: Blueprint defining a GitLab group, including its projects and members.

description.title: Group Description
description.description: A brief description of the group.

projectCount.title: Project Count
projectCount.description: The number of projects within the group.

membersCount.title: Members Count
membersCount.description: The number of members within the group.

createdAt.title: Project Created At
createdAt.description: The created date and time of the project.

lastActivityAt.title: Project Last Activity
lastActivityAt.description: The update date and time of the project.

openIssuesCount.title: Open Issues
openIssuesCount.description: The open issues count of the project

openMergeRequestsCount.title: Open Merges
openMergeRequestsCount.description: The merge requests open count for the project

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: The list of languages in the project

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The update date of the repository

starCount.title: Stars
starCount.description: The number of stars for the project

defaultBranch.title: Default Branch
defaultBranch.description: The default branch for the project

readmeUrl.title: Readme URL
readmeUrl.description: The URL of the readme file

readme.title: Readme
readme.description: The content of the readme file

allBranchesRequiredReviews.title: All Branches Required Reviews
allBranchesRequiredReviews.description: The number of reviews required for all branches MR rules for the project

protectedBranchesRequiredReviews.title: Protected Branches Required Reviews
protectedBranchesRequiredReviews.description: The number of reviews required for protected branches MR rules for the project

defaultBranchRequiredReviews.title: Default Branch Required Reviews
defaultBranchRequiredReviews.description: The number of reviews required for default branch MR rules for the project

title: Gitlab Group Member
description: Blueprint defining a member of a GitLab group, including their role and contributions.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The date and time the member joined the group.

email.title: Email
email.description: The email address of the member.

username.title: Username
username.description: The GitLab username of the member.

name.title: Name
name.description: The full name of the member.

groups.title: Groups
groups.description: The group this member belongs to

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A markdown description of the merge request.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The closing date of the issue

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The last update date of the issue

closedAt.title: Closed At
closedAt.description: The date time when the issue was closed

state.title: Status
state.description: The current status of the issue

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Labels associated with the issue for categorization

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: The project this resource belongs to

assignees.title: Assignees
assignees.description: The list of assignees responsible for the issue

title: Gitlab Merge Request
description: Blueprint definition for GitLab Merge Request

url.title: Link
url.description: The URL link to the GitLab merge request.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A markdown description of the merge request.

createdAt.title: Closed At
createdAt.description: The creation date of the merge request.

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The last update date of the pull request.

state.title: Status
state.description: The current status of the merge request

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: The list of labels for the merge request

sourceBranch.title: Source Branch
sourceBranch.description: The source branch of the merge request

targetBranch.title: Target Branch
targetBranch.description: The target branch of the merge request

mergedAt.title: Merged At
mergedAt.description: The merge date of the merge request

commitSHA.title: Commit SHA
commitSHA.description: The latest commit hash of the merge request

additions.title: Additions
additions.description: The number of additions in the merge request

deletions.title: Deletions
deletions.description: The number of deletions in the merge request

changes.title: Total
changes.description: The total number of changes in the merge request

fileCount.title: Files
fileCount.description: The number of files in the merge request

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: The project this resource belongs to

author.title: Creator
author.description: The author of the merge request

assignees.title: Assignees
assignees.description: The list of assignees responsible for the merge request

reviewers.title: Reviewers
reviewers.description: The list of reviewers for the merge request

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The timestamp of the last update

commitSHA.title: Commit SHA
commitSHA.description: The commit hash the pipeline ran in

startedAt.title: Started At
startedAt.description: The timestamp of the pipeline start

finishedAt.title: Finished At
finishedAt.description: The timestamp of the pipeline finish

branch.title: Branch
branch.description: The branch for which the pipeline was created

failureReason.title: Failure Reason
failureReason.description: The failure reason of the pipeline

successful.title: Successful?
successful.description: A boolean flag indicating if the pipeline has finished successfully.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: The project this resource belongs to

triggeredBy.title: Triggered By
triggeredBy.description: The user who triggered the pipeline

url.title: Link
url.description: The URL link to the GitLab merge request.

externalUrl.title: External Link
externalUrl.description: The URL link to the external representation of the environment (outside of Gitlab).

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The timestamp when the environment was created

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the the environment was last updated

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: The project this environment belongs to

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the pipeline.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: Date & Time at which this deployment was executed.

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: Date & Time at which this deployment was last updated.

finishedAt.title: Finished At
finishedAt.description: Date & Time at which this deployment finished.

number.title: Number
number.description: the auto-incremented position of this deployment within its pipeline

envLink.title: Env Url
envLink.description: Link to the environment page in Gitlab listing all the deployments.

outputLink.title: Output Url
outputLink.description: Link to the output of the deployment (outside of Gitlab)

jobLink.title: Job Url
jobLink.description: Link to the job logs page in Gitlab that deployment occurred in.

pipelineLink.title: Pipeline Url
pipelineLink.description: Link to the pipeline execution in Gitlab that deployment occurred in.

branch.title: Branch
branch.description: The branch for which the pipeline was created

commit.title: Commit
commit.description: The hash of the commit the deployment targeted.

jobId.title: Job
jobId.description: The Job ID of the job the deployment occurred in.

commitTitle.title: Commit  Title
commitTitle.description: The title of the commit the deployment targeted.

commitMessage.title: Commit Message
commitMessage.description: The message of the commit the deployment targeted.

commitAuthor.title: Commit
commitAuthor.description: The person of the commit the deployment targeted.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: The project this deployment belongs to

triggeredBy.title: Triggered By
triggeredBy.description: The user that triggered this deployment

pipeline.title: Pipeline
pipeline.description: The Pipeline this deployment ran in

title: Gitlab Pipeline Job
description: Blueprint defining a GitLab pipeline job

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The timestamp when the job created

startedAt.title: Started At
startedAt.description: The timestamp of the job start

finishedAt.title: Finished At
finishedAt.description: The timestamp of the job finish

failureMessage.title: Failure Message
failureMessage.description: The failure message of the pipeline

allowFailure.title: Allow Failure
allowFailure.description: Whether the job is allowed to fail

stage.title: Stage
stage.description: The stage the job belongs to

pipeline.title: Pipeline
pipeline.description: The pipeline this job belongs to
